sentence.Network_en: He has the perfect body scale: wide sholder and slender haunch.

sentence.Network_en: Restrain tired, improve memory and pain on haunch.

sentence.Network_en: The haunch of venison is delicious.

jx.jx_en_mean: squat with the haunches resting on the backs of the heels

derivation.yuyuan_name: middle English: from Old French hanche, of Germanic origin

entry.def: If you get down on your haunches, you lower yourself towards the ground so that your legs are bent under you and you are balancing on your feet.

example.ex: Ferris was crouched down on his haunches.

entry.def: The haunches of an animal or person are the area of the body which includes the bottom, the hips, and the tops of the legs.

means.word_mean: 1. the hip and buttock and upper thigh in human beings
2. the loin and leg of a quadruped

auth_sentence.content: Take what was once a prime haunch of beef, and cut away at it, over the decades, till all that's left is the carcass.
